Hi Mike
So great of you to recommend Bill Rannows  . I am glad to hear that=
 you have bought some fine swords from him. I am about to buy swords from h=
im and did not at all feel anything wrong in our correspondance, only that =
he seems good and straight as you describe him. But I have been cheeted awf=
ul before using the net, even though I had copy of passport and drivers lic=
ense. I am also new in collecting and buying on the net. Therefore I am ver=
y carefully to ask peoble with the same interest whether a seller is trustf=
ully or not. I am very anxious to learn what I can from others but do not l=
ike to spend money for a sword and then don=B4t get it. I wish to be aware =
about who are the bad guys and who are the good ones. .

Hi Steve
Thankyou =
so much for the link. Will love to investigate all the beautyful photos fur=
ther.

Appreciate your help
All the best
Allan

him.  He 
  mainly sells polished and papered swords.  He is a good guy and=

  shooter.  I recommend him.  I have not been disappointed in =
the swords I 
  have bought from him.  Hope that helps, Mike
